title: Venus Transit in the 12th House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Venus transits the 12th house for Libra ascendant, pleasure, relationships, and values turn inward. Desire for privacy, rest, and emotional retreat increases. Expenses related to comfort, travel, or luxury may rise, requiring conscious control. Relationships seek quiet understanding rather than display. Creative and spiritual pursuits flourish behind the scenes. Venus teaches that true satisfaction comes from inner harmony, not excess, when boundaries and discipline are maintained.

sections.heading: Expenses & Comfort
points: Spending on luxury or travel rises

closing: This transit redirects pleasure inward. With discipline, Venus transforms retreat into healing and lasting emotional balance.
